name: Island Taxi
description:
Yahtzee Crowshaw is making a game a month to work on finishing his designs, and I'm trying to do the same!  The game is complete with 7 levels.

This is my first project.  You need to fly your helicopter around the archipelago and deliver guests to their destinations.  If you make them wait too long they'll complain to Management and get you fired!

Watch out for the storms!
